title: Police brutality - Cincinatti protest (Ohio State Highway Patrol)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Ohio Open Records Law, I hereby request the following records:

- All video, including but not limited to bodycam, dashcam, drone footage, stationary surveillance, and real-time crime center footage of the protest, riot, demonstration, vigil, march, alleged civil unreset, alleged unlawful assembly, and use of force incident on the Robeling Bridge on July 17, 2025. 
- All emails, reports, memorandums, letters, statements (including, but not limited to those from officers, witnesses, victims, and anyone charged with a crime in relationship with the event), text messages, taser logs, CAD log, citations, arrested reports, out-briefing, after action report, related to the protest, riot, demonstration, vigil, march, alleged civil unreset, alleged unlawful assembly, and use of force incident on the Robeling Bridge on July 17, 2025 on the Robeling Bridge on July 17, 2025.
- All office of internal affairs or human resources emails, reports, memorandums, letters, statements, investigations, agreements related to the protest, riot, demonstration, vigil, march, alleged civil unreset, alleged unlawful assembly, and use of force incident on the Robeling Bridge on July 17, 2025 on the Robeling Bridge on July 17, 2025.

The incident is referenced in these news reports:
https://www.facebook.com/watch/?v=2160075287833562
https://www.cincinnati.com/story/news/2025/07/19/covington-police-response-roebling-bridge-protest/85283594007/
https://www.covingtonky.gov/news/2025/07/19/mayor-and-police-chief-hold-press-conference-after-incident-on-the-roebling-bridge

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Lara S Nochomovitz
